DOC.brief_summary: A cluster randomize field trial evaluate impact train healthcare worker healthy feeding practice nutrition health child .
DOC.brief_title: Impact `` Ten Steps Healthy Feeding Children Younger Than Two Years '' Health Centers
DOC.detailed_description: A cluster randomize control trial . Twenty health care service site randomly assign intervention control group . Health care worker intervention health care service sit receive training base programme `` Ten step healthy feed child birth two year old '' . Pregnant woman , third term , enrol study . At 6 12 month age , mother interview home use semi-structured questionnaire pre-coded close- open-ended question child evaluate . When child 3 year old , mother interview home mother child evaluate .
DOC.criteria: All pregnant woman last quarter gestation . HIVpositive mother congenital malformation
